groupName.description: The display name for this clinical concept group.

graphType.description: The way the graph should be plotted for this display group. If NONE, then graph will not be displayed.

displayGroupOnSameAxis.description: Whether the concepts in this group should be displayed on the same axis, or each on their individual axis in the same card.

parentGroupName.description: If this concept group represents one axis on a card with multiple axes, then this should be set to the parent group's name.
